properties.entry: INSERT /* com.greedy.run.Application#main() */ INTO TBL_MEMBER A ( A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.GENDER , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.ADDRESS , A.AGE , A.ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAR , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, AGE, ENROLL_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER
